instructions: If you have not already done so, set up the iCloud for Windows app . See Set up iCloud on an iPhone, iPad, iPod touch, Mac or Windows computer . On your Windows computer, open iCloud for Windows . Select Mail, Contacts, Calendars and Tasks, then click Apply. Your iCloud Mail account is listed in the folder list (also called the navigation pane ) on the left side of Microsoft Outlook. To view your iCloud Mail folders in Outlook, click the disclosure triangle to the left of your iCloud email account.
